name: Get To The Mountain
description:
A car driving exploration game made in four hours for Trijam #82

Theme was delay, so I made some delayed thrusters. 

I tried to make it under three hours, but I had too big plans ^^

It took me four and a half hour.

It's my first time participating in a game jam.

Music and sound effects made by @Digital_Destruction

And I hope you won't find the game too dificult. I placed some beacons into the world to help you.

I tried making a web playable version, but failed. :(

Controls

Arrows to drive

Spacebar for jets - two seconds delay here!

F to flip

Stop the car to look around

Tools used

Unity 3D

Blender

One sound designer

Downloaded assets:

LeanTween

A car from Unity Standard Assets 

A skybox (FREE Skybox Extended Shader)

A car visuals from Kenney Car Kit

Low Poly Tree Pack

Low Poly Rock Pack
